entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -22.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -24.8°C
Wind: ESE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
